input.sentences: he had finally achieved his goal !
does n't he look so cute up there !
the dog and young ones were so excited !
there was much to celebrate this day !
things got livelier as the night went on .
output.sentences: Today was graduation day, and his mom was taking many pictures of him.
Even as he walked to receive his diploma, she was still taking pictures.
He had worked so hard to get this diploma because he wanted to set a good example for his son.
After graduation, he went home and saw the cake his parents had bought for him, which had his favorite thing on it, horses.
After the party was over, him and some friends had a few beers and talked about their next steps in life.
